name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: How to Calculate BMI / Body Fat Calculator

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly calculate your BMI and Body Fat Percentage with health advice and detailed info.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The 'How to Calculate BMI / Body Fat Percentage Calculator' extension is a simple tool designed for individuals who want to monitor their health metrics. With this extension:

• Enter your height, weight, gender, and age.
• Get instant calculations for both BMI and Body Fat Percentage.
• Receive health advice based on your results.
• Click on the information link to learn more about BMI and Body Fat Percentage and their importance in health monitoring.
